text.en: All sentient beings always take refuge in the Guru;
text.en-trans: semchen tamché takpar lama la kyab su chi o

text.en: Take refuge in the Buddha;
text.en-trans: sangye la kyab su chi o

text.en: Take refuge in the Dharma; and
text.en-trans: chö la kyab su chi o

text.en: Take refuge in the Saṅgha.
text.en-trans: gendün la kyab su chi o

text.en: Homage to the blessed one, the tathāgata, the arhat, the complete and perfect Buddha, Śākyamuni!
text.en-trans: chomdendé dezhin shekpa drachompa yangdakpar dzokpé sangye shakya tubpa la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to Vajra Conqueror;2
text.en-trans: dorjé nyingpo rabtu jompa la chaktsal lo

text.en-trans: rinchen pemé nampar nönpa la chaktsal lo

text.en: Homage to the tathāgata, the arhat, the complete and perfect buddha, Lotus Jewel Steadfast like the King of Mountains.34
text.en-trans: dezhin shekpa drachompa yangdakpar dzokpé sangye rinpoche dang pemé den la rabtu zhukpa riwang gi gyalpo la chaktsal lo

text.en: May you, and however many other blessed ones, tathāgatas, arhats, complete and perfect buddhas there are living and dwelling in all the world systems in all directions—all you blessed buddhas—please pay attention to me!
text.en-trans: dedak lasokpa chok chü jikten gyi kham tamché na dezhin shekpa drachompa yangdakpar dzokpé sangye chomdendé gang jinyé chik zhuk té tso zhing zhepé sangye chomdendé dedak tamché dak la gong su sol

text.en: In this life and all my other lives circling from one form of saṃsāric existence to the next throughout beginningless time—whatever wrongs I may have done, or caused other to do, or have rejoiced in;
text.en-trans: dak gi kyewa di dang kyewa tokma dang tama machipa né khorwa na khorwé kyené tamché du dikpé lé gyipa dang gyi du tsalwa dang gyipa la jesu yirangwa am

text.en: Whatever possessions of stūpas, possessions of the Saṅgha, or possessions of saṅghas dwelling in all directions, I may have appropriated, caused others to appropriate, or rejoiced in the appropriation of;
text.en-trans: chörten gyi kor ram gendün gyi kor ram chok chü gendün gyi kor trokpa dang trok tu tsalwa dang trokpa la jesu yirangwa am

text.en: Whichever of the five actions of immediate retribution I may have committed, caused others to commit, or rejoiced in;
text.en-trans: tsam machipa ngé lé gyipa dang gyi du tsalwa dang gyipa la jesu yirangwa am

text.en: Whichever path of the ten unwholesome actions I may have embarked upon or am currently residing on, incited others to enter, or rejoiced in;
text.en-trans: migewa chü lé kyi lam yangdakpar langpa la zhukpa dang juk tu tsalwa dang zhukpa la jesu yirangwa am

text.bo: ལས་ཀྱི་སྒྲིབ་པ་གང་གིས་བསྒྲིབས་ནས་བདག་སེམས་ཅན་དམྱལ་བར་མཆི་བའམ། དུད་འགྲོའི་སྐྱེ་གནས་སུ་མཆི་བའམ། ཡི་དྭགས་ཀྱི་ཡུལ་དུ་མཆི་བའམ། ཡུལ་མཐའ་འཁོབ་ཏུ་སྐྱེ་བའམ། ཀླ་ཀློར་སྐྱེ་བའམ། ལྷ་ཚེ་རིང་པོ་རྣམས་སུ་སྐྱེ་བའམ། དབང་པོ་མ་ཚང་བར་འགྱུར་བའམ། ལྟ་བ་ལོག་པར་འཛིན་པར་འགྱུར་བའམ། སངས་རྒྱས་འབྱུང་བ་ལ་མཉེས་པར་མི་བགྱིད་པར་འགྱུར་བའི་ལས་ཀྱི་སྒྲིབ་པ་གང་ལགས་པ་དེ་དག་ཐམས་ཅད་སངས་རྒྱས་བཅོམ་ལྡན་འདས་ཡེ་ཤེས་སུ་གྱུར་པ།
text.en: Whatever karmic veils I may have developed that would lead to the hells, or to the animal realm, or to the land of the pretas, or to birth in border regions, or amongst barbarians, or amongst the long-lived gods, or that would lead to incomplete sense faculties, or holding wrong views, or to not rejoicing at the advent of a Buddha—
text.en-trans: lé kyi dribpa gang gi drib né dak semchen nyalwar chiwa am düdrö kyené su chiwa am yidak kyi yul du chiwa am yul takhob tu kyewa am lalor kyewa am lha tseringpo nam su kyewa am wangpo matsangwar gyurwa am tawa lokpar dzinpar gyurwa am sangye jungwa la nyepar mi gyipar gyurwé lé kyi dribpa gang lakpa dedak tamché sangye chomdendé yeshe su gyurpa

text.en: All of these I confess in the presence of the blessed buddhas, who are aware, who observe, who are witnesses, who are authorities, who know and see. I admit them and do not conceal them, and I make a vow to refrain from them henceforth!
text.en-trans: chen du gyurpa pang du gyurpa tsemar gyurpa khyenpé zikpa dedak gi chen ngar tol lo chak so mi chabwo mi bé do lenché kyang chö ching dompa gyi lak so

text.en: All you blessed buddhas, please pay attention to me!
text.en-trans: sangye chomdendé dedak tamché dak la gong su sol

text.en: Over the course of this life and all other lives in saṃsāra without beginning or end—whatever wholesomeness there may be from having given gifts to others, even as little as a mouthful of food to a being born as an animal;
text.en-trans: dak gi kyewa di dang kyewa tokma dang tama chipa né khorwa na khorwé kyené zhendak tu jinpa tana düdrö kyené su kyepa la zé kham chik tsam tsalwé gewé tsawa gang lakpa dang

text.en: Whatever wholesomeness there may be in having preserved discipline;
text.en-trans: dak gi tsultrim sungpé gewé tsawa gang lakpa dang

text.en: Whatever wholesomeness there may be in having maintained chaste behavior;
text.en-trans: dak gi tsangpar chöpa la nepé gewé tsawa gang lakpa dang

text.en: Whatever wholesomeness there may be in having caused sentient beings to mature;
text.en-trans: dak gi semchen yongsu minpar gyipé gewé tsawa gang lakpa dang

text.en: Whatever wholesomeness there may be in having roused a mind set on supreme awakening;
text.en-trans: dak gi changchub chok tu semkyepé gewé tsawa gang lakpa dang

text.en: Whatever wholesomeness there may be in unsurpassable wisdom—
text.en-trans: dak gi lanamepa yeshe kyi gewé tsawa gang lakpa dedak tamché chik tu dü shing dum té

text.en: Combining, gathering, and collecting all of this together, I dedicate it to the unexcelled, unsurpassed, most exalted, the most excellent; I dedicate it to unsurpassable, complete and perfect awakening.
text.en-trans: dom né lana machipa dang gong nama chipa dang gongmé gongma lamé lamar yongsu ngowé lanamepa yangdakpar dzokpé changchub tu yongsu ngowar gyi o

text.en: Just as past blessed buddhas have dedicated, and just as future buddhas, blessed ones, will dedicate, and just as the buddhas, blessed ones of the present in all directions, are dedicating now, I also fully dedicate in the very same way.
text.en-trans: jitar depé sangye chomdendé nam kyi yongsu ngöpa dang jitar majönpé sangye chomdendé nam kyi yongsu ngowar gyurwa dang jitar dantar zhukpé sangye chomdendé nam kyi yongsu ngowar dzepa dezhindu dak gi kyang yongsu ngowar gyi o

text.en: I confess each and every misdeed.
text.en-trans: dikpa tamché ni sosor shak so

text.en: I rejoice in all goodness.
text.en-trans: sönam tamché la ni jesu yi rang ngo

text.en: I request and pray to all the buddhas to teach and remain in saṃsāra.
text.en-trans: sangye tamché la ni kul zhing solwa deb so

text.en: May I attain sublime, supreme, unsurpassed wisdom!
text.en-trans: dak gi lanamepa yeshe kyi chok dampa tobpar gyur chik

text.en: Supreme among humans, Victors now present,
text.en-trans: michok gyalwa gangdak dantar zhukpa dang

text.en: Those of the past, and those yet to come,
text.en-trans: gangdak depa dak dang dezhin gang majön

text.en: Your praiseworthy qualities are boundless like the ocean—
text.en-trans: yönten ngakpa tayé gyatso dra kün la

text.en: With folded palms, I take refuge in you!
text.en-trans: talmo jarwar gyi té kyab su nyewar chi o
